problem_names:
lemma simple_rule_dtor_ids:
    "uncurry SimpleRule \<circ> simple_rule_dtor = id"
    "simple_rule_dtor \<circ> uncurry SimpleRule = id"
translations:
lemma simple_rule_dtor_ids:
    "uncurry SimpleRule \<circ> simple_rule_dtor = id"
    "simple_rule_dtor \<circ> uncurry SimpleRule = id"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. uncurry SimpleRule \<circ> simple_rule_dtor = id &&&
    simple_rule_dtor \<circ> uncurry SimpleRule = id

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x.
       uncurry SimpleRule
        (case x of SimpleRule x xa \<Rightarrow> (x, xa)) =
       id x &&&
    \<forall>x.
       (case uncurry SimpleRule x of
        SimpleRule x xa \<Rightarrow> (x, xa)) =
       id x
